name: get_available_markets
description: CRITICAL FIRST STEP. Use this tool to get a list of all available markets (mandis or areas) for seed dealers in a given state and district. The output of this tool is required as input to use the 'get_dealers_for_market' tool.

state.description: The full name of the state, e.g., 'Uttar Pradesh'.

district.description: The full name of the district, e.g., 'Kanpur Nagar'.
